subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Sam Stosur knocked the two-time champion Maria Sharapova out of the Pan Pacific Open in Tokyo, reaching the semifinals with a 6-4, 7-6 (10) victory.
snippet: Sam Stosur knocked the two-time champion Maria Sharapova out of the Pan Pacific Open in Tokyo, reaching the semifinals with a 6-4, 7-6 (10) victory.
